name: Dungeon & Hunter: Idle RPG
description:
Welcome to the 2D pixel art RPG adventure!
If you want retro style RPG, this game may be highly suitable for you!

The Adventures of a Legendary Hunter with Bow and Arrow!
An Exciting Pixel Art Style RPG! A Real Idle Archery Game!
Dungeon & Hunter!

▶ Away From Keyboard(AFK)! It’s Idle Game!
Auto battle system will set your hands free!
Portrait mobile game that you can enjoy freely with only one hand.

▶ Mysterious Archery Weapons - Bows and Arrows!
You can combine, disassemble, upgrade your weapons!
Make Epic, Unique, Legendary grade bow and arrow!
The stronger weapons can defeat monsters more easily! Level Up Your Weapons!

▶ The Adventure to Dangerous Dungeon!
There are so many boss monsters in dungeon!
Endless rewards from occupied dungeon!

▶ Hunting and Raising Pet System
Hunt pets like Golem and Kerberos, Angel, Devil and more!
Raise and make them more powerful!

▶ Artifacts and Skills
Mysterious artifacts and magical skills will help your battle!
Collect them all!!

▶ Customize Hunter Character!
A hundred costumes not only make hunter look better, but also make him more powerful!
Customize hunter as you want!

▶ Quest and Mission, Mini Games!
A dice game - Play with cute Mandragora!
Quest and Missions awaits you, complete them all and get rewards

A Real Incremental Idle Game! Dungeon & Hunter!
Conquer the Dungeon With Your Hunter Right Now!
